document.full_text: the tony-nominated play, which stars mark rylance as the manly, mangy, quasi-magical trailer denizen johnny "rooster" byron, will run at the music box theater through aug. 21.
document.title: 'jerusalem' gets four-week extension on broadway
lines_and_colors: the tony-nominated play, which stars mark rylance as the manly, mangy, quasi-magical trailer denizen johnny "rooster" byron, will run at the music box theater through aug. 21.
